name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: home_middle_space
label: Home Middle Space
description: This setting controls the space on the homepage in the middle below the rotator. You can choose from any boxes you have made.

name: home_story_tag
label: Home Stories Tag
description: This tag controls which stories show below the Home Middle Space.

name: footer_links_space
label: Footer Links Space
description: This space controls the footer links area.

name: home_middle_space_2
label: Home Middle Space 2
description: This space controls the area below the group of stories on the homepage. You can choose from any boxes you have made.

name: home_middle_image
label: Home Middle Image
description: This image appears near the middle of the homepage just below the stories list. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: home_lower_col_1
label: Home Lower Col 1
description: This space is the first column in the lower set of 3 columns. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: home_lower_col_2
label: Home Lower Col 2
description: This space is the second column in the lower set of 3 columns. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: home_lower_col_3
label: Home Lower Col 4
description: This space is the third column in the lower set of 3 columns. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: home_bottom_space
label: Home Bottom Space
description: This space controls the lowest area above the footer on the homepage. You can choose from any boxes you have made.

name: footer_col_1
label: Footer Col 1
description: This space controls the first column in the footer. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: footer_col_2
label: Footer Col 2
description: This space controls the second column in the footer. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: footer_col_3
label: Footer Col 3
description: This space controls the third column in the footer. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: interior_sidebar
label: Interior Sidebar
description: This space controls the interior sidebar. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: colorvars
label: Color Vars
description: These are the colors that are used by the theme.
value: @background:Background Color:#fff; @primary:Primary Color:#293778; @secondary:Secondary Color:#28BDFB; @complimentary:Complimentary Color:#166B28; @text:Text Color:#333; @offtext:Offtext Color:#eee;
